price: Ndetse yumviraga ababyeyi be kandi ntiyari intakoreka cyangwa ngo yigomeke (kuri Allah ndetse no ku babyeyi be).
arabic: وَبَرَّۢا بِوَٰلِدَيۡهِ وَلَمۡ يَكُن جَبَّارًا عَصِيّٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wabarran biwālidayhi walam yakun jabbāran ʿaṣiyyan
